data.name: Sentinels of the Multiverse - Soundtrack (Volume 6)
data.detailed_description:
Listen to the music of the Multiverse wherever you are! Each environment in the Multiverse has its own music that helps set the mood. Each Villain has his or her own theme music they use to rally their troops.

Composed and performed by Jean-Marc Giffin, this soundtrack includes all music created for and appearing in Vengeance, the expansion for Sentinels of the Multiverse: The Video Game.

This Soundtrack also includes a special bonus - all the original stems used to create the team villain victory themes heard in the game! Mix and match the pieces to create your own team villain theme song! Jean-Marc shows you how here.

Full track listing:

1. Villains of the Multiverse
2. Freedom Tower
3. Mobile Defense Platform
4. Baron Blade
5. Ermine
6. Fright Train
7. Friction
8. Proletariat
9. Chokepoint
10. Chalk it up to Kismet (Trickster Variant)
11. Mobile Defense Platform Explodes
12. The Sentinels of the Multiverse (2nd Anniversary Mix)
13. The Sentinels of the Multiverse (Pre-Alpha 2014 Piano Sketch) [BONUS]


This soundtrack is comprised of 320kbps MP3 files. You must have Sentinels of the Multiverse installed to receive the DLC content.

data.short_description: Listen to the music of the Multiverse with you, wherever you are!

Sentinels of The Multiverse: The Video Game is an officially licensed product of “Sentinels of the Multiverse®” from Greater Than Games LLC.
